lang.girlDesc: Always remember, there will be reverberations
lang.searchPlaceholder: Please enter search keywords and press enter
lang.hottestDryGoods: Hottest Dry goods of the week
lang.requestFailed: Request failed, please try again later
lang.firstSectionMessage: Looking at the scenery outside the window through the car window slipped in front of me, I don’t know how many distances I have traveled, I always can’t find my platform, quietly watching countless hands held together, I can only hold my hand, looking forward to The person will never come back, time will not reverse, love cannot be recovered, quietly listening to the sound of the whistle of the car, silently watching the rushing pedestrian, a person holding the unanswered mobile phone in a daze, that dial The signal of not going out, the unanswerable answer, the familiar and strange voice...
lang.secondSectionMessage: If there is no such autumn, if there is no such autumn eve, if there is no such encounter, who would hold the string of past that dare not let go for a long time, hide in the corner of no one, secretly miss.
lang.thirdSectionMessage: The blank state of mind, the distant dream, the drifting, the free... It seems like centuries, so long. For the beauty that longed for a long time in dreams, I waited and foolishly read it, and the years passed by my haggard figure suddenly and secretly.
lang.fourthSectionMessage: So... so... so please feel free to leave a message 😂😂 (as long as the server does not crash😇)
